outline:
1. to pick up, gather, glean, gather up
    1. (Qal)
      1. to pick up, gather
      2. to glean
    2. (Piel)
      1. to gather, gather up
      2. to collect (money)
      3. to glean
    3. (Pual) to be picked up
    4. (Hithpael) to collect oneself
strongs_def: properly, to pick up, i.e. (generally) to gather; specifically, to glean
